description: This file contains utility functions for handling RISC-V SBI payloads, FDT paths, and dependency determination within a build system, likely used in build scripts or recipes.
external_files: Potential external build scripts or recipes that utilize these functions

methods.name: riscv_get_extra_oemake_image
methods.description: Returns a formatted path string for the SBI payload image based on build variables.

methods.name: riscv_get_extra_oemake_fdt
methods.description: Returns a formatted path string for the FDT file based on build variables.

methods.name: riscv_get_do_compile_depends
methods.description: Determines build dependencies based on the presence and content of SBI payload and FDT variables.
